note:
Born in 1961, yet didn't become a hippie.
Lived all my life in the Great White North, Canada, white for the snow, not something else

I love sharing stories and ideas, those I create and those I ad my admire.

Semi-retired blue collar worker. Leaves my brain free to create and imagine.

Single, no children. Sadly, no pets

Love anime and manga, fantasy, science fiction. Also medical dramas.

Despite being mobility impaired, love going for long walks. i do need to rest after climbing stairs
